TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailMessage extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示可以使用 类发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Represents an email message that can be sent using the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类用于构造传输到用于传递使用的 SMTP 服务器的电子邮件类。Instances of the class are used to construct email messages that are transmitted to an SMTP server for delivery using the class. 发件人、 收件人、 主题和电子邮件消息的正文可以指定为参数时用于初始化对象。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 这些参数还可以设置或上使用属性访问对象。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可能使用的以下属性将设置主邮件消息标头和消息元素类。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件标头或部分Mail header or part|PropertyProperty| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |抄送 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自定义头的编码Encoding for custom headers|| |消息正文Message body|| |优先级Priority|| |收件人Recipient|| |答复到Reply-To|| |发件人Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| 类还允许应用程序访问消息使用的标头集合属性。The class also allows an application to access the headers collection for the message using the property. 虽然此集合是只读的 （新的集合不能设置），自定义标头可以添加到或从该集合中删除。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 添加任何自定义标头将包含时实例发送。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 仅标头发送一条消息之前，请专门添加到此集合中收集中包括的属性。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 后发送实例，属性还将包括使用的关联的属性设置的标头类或参数传递时用于初始化对象。After a the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件标头格式不正确，它们可能会导致损坏的电子邮件消息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何邮件标头中可以使用上的属性设置的标头集合仅应使用设置类类属性，或作为参数传递时初始化对象。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 不应使用添加邮件标头的以下列表为使用这些标头设置属性和任何值属性将被丢弃或覆盖发送消息时：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - BccBcc - CcCc - Content-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - FromFrom - 重要性Importance - MIME-VersionMIME-Version - 优先级Priority - 答复到Reply-To - 发件人Sender - 到To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未指定 X 发件人标头使用属性，类发送消息时将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 使用属性不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您在 HTML 中发送一条消息，可能还想要提供纯文本版本以防到部分收件人使用电子邮件的无法显示 HTML 内容的读取器。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 有关示例，演示如何使用替代视图中创建一条消息，请参阅。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with alternate views, see . 使用属性来将附件添加到电子邮件。Use the property to add attachments to an email message. 有关示例，演示如何创建带有附件的一条消息，请参阅。For an example that demonstrates creating a message with an attachment, see . 将你的电子邮件之后, 你可以使用发送或方法。After assembling your email message, you can send it by using the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送电子邮件消息，其中包含附件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message that includes an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AlternateViews As AlternateViewCollection

summary.span: 获取用于存储邮件正文的替代形式的附件集合。

span.span: Gets the attachment collection used to store alternate forms of the message body.
A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。Use the property to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您在 HTML 中发送一条消息，可能还想要提供纯文本版本以防到部分收件人使用电子邮件的无法显示 HTML 内容的读取器。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want to provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 若要添加到另一种视图对象，请创建对于视图，然后将它添加到返回的集合。To add an alternate view to a object, create an for the view, and then add it to the collection returned by . 使用属性以指定文本版本并使用集合，以指定视图与其他 MIME 类型。Use the property to specify the text version and use the collection to specify views with other MIME types. 使用类成员来指定替代视图的 MIME 类型。Use the class members to specify the MIME type for the alternate view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送电子邮件具有纯文本和 HTML 替代视图。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with a plain text and an HTML alternate view. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

A writable .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用返回的集合属性来添加附件，如文件或的内容，到此。Use the collection returned by the property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a , to this . 创建，包含或引用数据附加，，然后添加到返回的集合。Create an that contains or references the data to be attached, and then add the to the collection returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送带有附件的电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating and sending an email message with an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

span.span: Gets the address collection that contains the blind carbon copy (BCC) recipients for this email message.
A writable object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要添加到电子邮件的密件抄送收件人，创建收件人的地址、，然后将该对象添加到返回的集合属性。To add a BCC recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by the property. 当收件人查看电子邮件，地址通常不显示。When recipients view an email message, the addresses are usually not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示添加到地址地址集合。The following code example demonstrates adding an address to the address collection. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Body { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置邮件正文。

span.span: Gets or sets the message body.
A value that contains the body text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的内容是"文本/plain"。The of the content is "text/plain". 指定用于与正文的编码属性。Specify the encoding used for the body with the property. 如果可用提供更丰富的显示选项，以便收件人的替代格式的正文内容，则可以通过使用指定的正文内容的替代视图属性。If the body content is available in alternative formats that provide richer presentation options for the recipients, you can specify alternate views for the body content by using the property. 例如，应用程序可以选择发送纯文本正文和消息正文的 HTML 版本。For example, an application might choose to send both the plain text body and an HTML version of the message body. 可以显示 HTML 的电子邮件读取器可以向正文该 HTML 版本接收方时无法显示 html 格式的读取器将显示的消息的纯文本版本相反。Email readers that can display HTML can present the HTML version of the body to the recipient, while readers that cannot display HTML will display the plain text version of the message instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于邮件正文的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to encode the message body.
An applied to the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的值属性可以设置字符组字段中的内容类型标头。The value specified for the property sets the character set field in the Content-Type header. 默认字符集是`"us-ascii"`。The default character set is `"us-ascii"`. 如果你设置属性， ，或，则框架将选择的此。If you set the property to , , or , the Framework selects a of for this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用 UTF8 编码一封电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates creating a mail message that uses UTF8 encoding. [!code-cpp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NclMailAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#3)]

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何释放。The following code example demonstrates disposing a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从地址不验证或未绑定到当前登录的用户。The from address is not validated or tied to the currently logged on user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following code example demonstrates setting a value for the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 获取与此电子邮件一起传输的电子邮件标头。

span.span: Gets the email headers that are transmitted with this email message.
A that contains the email headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许应用程序访问消息的标头集合。The property allows an application to access the headers collection for the message. 虽然此集合是只读的 （新的集合不能设置），自定义标头可以添加到或从该集合中删除。While this collection is read-only (a new collection can not be set), custom headers can be added to or deleted from this collection. 添加任何自定义标头将包含时实例发送。Any custom headers added will be included when the instance is sent. 仅标头发送一条消息之前，请专门添加到此集合中收集中包括的属性。Before a message is sent, only headers specifically added to this collection in the property are included in the collection. 后发送实例，属性还将包括使用的关联的属性设置的标头类或参数传递时用于初始化对象。After the instance is sent, the property will also include headers that are set using the associated properties of the class or parameters passed when a is used to initialize a object. 如果某些邮件标头格式不正确，它们可能会导致损坏的电子邮件消息。If some mail headers are malformed, they could cause the email message to become corrupted. 因此任何邮件标头中可以使用上的属性设置的标头集合仅应使用设置类类属性，或作为参数传递时初始化对象。So any mail header in the headers collection that can be set using a property on the class should only be set using the class property or as a parameter passed when a initializes a object. 不应使用添加邮件标头的以下列表为使用这些标头设置属性和任何值属性将被丢弃或覆盖发送消息时：The following list of mail headers should not be added using the property and any values set for these headers using the property will be discarded or overwritten when the message is sent: - BccBcc - CcCc - Content-IDContent-ID - Content-LocationContent-Location - Content-Transfer-EncodingContent-Transfer-Encoding - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - FromFrom - 重要性Importance - MIME-VersionMIME-Version - 优先级Priority - 答复到Reply-To - 发件人Sender - 到To - X 优先级X-Priority 如果应用程序未指定 X 发件人标头使用属性，类发送消息时将创建一个。If the application does not specify an X-Sender header using the property, the class will create one when the message is sent. 发件人、 收件人、 主题和电子邮件消息的正文可以指定为参数时用于初始化对象。The sender, recipient, subject, and body of an email message may be specified as parameters when a is used to initialize a object. 这些参数还可以设置或上使用属性访问对象。These parameters may also be set or accessed using properties on the object. 可能使用的以下属性将设置主邮件消息标头和消息元素类。The primary mail message headers and elements for the message may be set using the following properties of the class. |邮件标头或部分Mail header or part|PropertyProperty| |-------------------------|--------------| |附件Attachments|| |密件抄送 (BCC)Blind carbon copies (BCC)|| |抄送 (CC)Carbon copies (CC)|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |自定义头的编码Encoding for custom headers|| |消息正文Message body|| |优先级Priority|| |收件人Recipient|| |答复到Reply-To|| |发件人Sender|| |SubjectSubject|| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示一封电子邮件的标头。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers for a mail message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ HeadersEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此电子邮件的用户自定义标头使用的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used for the user-defined custom headers for this email message.

value.span: 用于用户定义此电子邮件的自定义标头的编码。

span.span: The encoding used for user-defined custom headers for this email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性默认为。The value of the property defaults to . SMTP 邮件由标头和正文部分组成。SMTP messages consist of headers and body parts. SMTP IETF Rfc 限制的标头和正文部分的名称为 ASCII。The IETF RFCs for SMTP restrict the header and body part names to be ASCII. 但是，IETF Rfc 允许标头和正文部分的值为包含 Unicode 字符。However, the IETF RFCs allow header and body part values to contain Unicode characters. 在任何特定值中，如果存在非 ASCII 字符，然后编码的值是结合使用的字符编码 （UTF8 或 Shift JIS，例如） 后跟字节编码 (或例如)。In any particular value, if non-ASCII characters exist, then the value is encoded using a combination of character encoding (UTF8 or Shift-JIS, for example) followed by byte encoding ( or for example). 结果通常是仅包含 ASCII 字符位于网络传输流。The result is usually that only ASCII characters are in the network transmission stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsBodyHtml { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示邮件正文是否为 HTML 格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the mail message body is in HTML.

value.span: 如果消息正文在 HTML;其他。

span.span: if the message body is in HTML; else .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailPriority Priority { System::Net::Mail::MailPriority get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailPriority value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此电子邮件的优先级。

span.span: Gets or sets the priority of this email message.

value.span: 包含此邮件的优先级的 。

span.span: A that contains the priority of this message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ ReplyTo { System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置邮件的回复地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the ReplyTo address for the mail message.

value.span: 指示 字段的值的 MailAddress。

span.span: A MailAddress that indicates the value of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指示地址以外地址用于回复此邮件。Use the property to indicate an address other than the address to use to reply to this message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplyToList As MailAddressCollection
public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ ReplyToList { System::Net::Mail::MailAddressCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取邮件的回复地址的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of addresses to reply to for the mail message.

value.span: 邮件的回复地址的列表。

span.span: The list of the addresses to reply to for the mail message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性不指示的地址的列表地址用于回复此邮件。Use the property to indicate the list of addresses other than the address to use to reply to this message. 属性替换仅允许单个地址回复的属性。The property replaces the property that only allows a single address to reply to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ Sender { System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Mail::MailAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此电子邮件的发件人地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the sender's address for this email message.

value.span: 包含发件人地址信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the sender's address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不验证或未绑定到当前登录的用户发件人地址。The sender's address is not validated or tied to the currently logged on user.

span.span: Gets or sets the subject line for this email message.
A that contains the subject content.

summary.span: 获取包含此电子邮件收件人的地址集合。

span.span: Gets the address collection that contains the recipients of this email message.
A writable object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定的电子邮件收件人行上的地址。The property is used to designate the addresses on the To line of an email message. 若要添加到电子邮件收件人，创建收件人的地址、，然后将该对象添加到此属性返回的集合。To add a recipient to an email message, create a for the recipient's address, and then add that object to the collection returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#7)]
